dct_title_s: Relief and mineral map of California showing the topography and the approximate locations of all the principal mineral deposits together with statistics of mineral production
dct_description_sm: issued by the California State Mining Board.
Includes production statistics for 1907 and comparative area map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work has been identified as being free of known restrictions under copyright law, including all related and neighboring rights. You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
